posts.post_content:
For sale - raw T205s, prices as below by PayPal friends and family  (negotiable for multiple cards).
Shipping via a white envelope, protected by cardsavers + cardboard, for total under $100, or via bubble envelope + cardsavers + cardboard, for total $100 or more.

"I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.

PM here or email to mpg1972 (at) gmail[dot]com

SOLD - 10 - John Bates .................... Sovereign ........... raw poor (heavy creasing, back staining and fading)
SOLD - 90 - Eddie Collins ................. Piedmont 25 ......... raw good (faint creases on bottom half, scratch in front of face)
SOLD - 16 - Hack Engle .................... Polar Bear........... raw fair (heavy creases 1/4 and 3/4, bottom-left corner, face is clean)
 35 - Art Fromme .................... Honest .............. raw vg (back miscut)
 24 - Harry Gaspar .................. Polar Bear .......... raw good+ (couple of chips of paper loss on front)
SOLD - 16 - Topsy Hartsel ................. Piedmont 25 ......... raw fair (front and back, staining and scuffing)
SOLD - 15 - John Miller (complete "B") .... Polar Bear .......... raw poor (paper loss, top-right on reverse)
 38 - Danny Murphy .................. Piedmont 25 ......... raw good-vg
 22 - Rube Oldring .................. Piedmont 25 ......... raw good (crease through chin, and bottom-right corner)
(Kroh not available)

I’ll take bates but sent you a pm offer on a trio. Regardless I’ll take that one. 

Steve
